name: Chronomaly Magella Globe
desc: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Chronomaly" monster from your Deck, except "Chronomaly Magella Globe". If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish 1 "Chronomaly" card from your GY, except "Chronomaly Magella Globe"; add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Chronomaly Magella Globe" once per turn.
